skillTree.name: Marienburg Steed
skillTree.description: The finest steed freshly imported to the City-State of Marienburg.

skillTree.name: Experienced Navigator
skillTree.description: Having travelled the Gilded route for so long, the Merchant Lord's know where to take short cuts

skillTree.name: Revered Smuggler
skillTree.description: Did you declare everything at the Secretariat of Trade Equity? But of course, no need to double check the hull.

effects.description: Reduce the charge in extortion events: -25%
Reduce the charge in extortion events: -50%

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Haeyndrik's Shield
skillTree.description: The god of money, wealth and power protects it's patrons with a shield of coins.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Baggage-Train
skillTree.description:
There is always room for a little more cargo, especially if carried by the famous Guild's Baggage-Train.
	
	Warning: Your unit with the lowest value will be replaced with Merchant Baggage train if this army has no space for them.

effects.description: Adds one Merchant Guild Baggage-Train to this Convoy

skillTree.name: Rest and Recreation
skillTree.description: Keeping the Convoy fit and happy is vital for success among the Gilded Route.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.name: Shrewd Paymaster
skillTree.description: Pay? Upkeep? Focus on the journey, the adventure. Is that not pay enough?

skillTree.name: Generous Outfitter
skillTree.description: If bandits take a unfortunate swing at the convoy, good equipment might be the difference between life and death.

skillTree.name: Imperial Teachings
skillTree.description: This Lord has gone to Reikland to follow several courses on the Reiksacademy, as with all threats along the route the Lords are as much Merchant as they are General.

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Deadeye
skillTree.description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Goedendagers, Riverwardens, Sartosa Free company and Halberdiers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Reiksguard, Sons of Manann and all Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Reiksguard, Sons of Manann and all Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Hunting Hounds, Empire Knights, Reiksguard, and Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Greatswords, Knights Mariner, and Demigryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

effects.description:
Ward save: 7% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 11% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for War Wagon, Steam Tank and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 15% for War Wagon, Steam Tank, Landship, Baggage-Train and Luminark of Hysh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Swordsmen, Flagellants, Huntsmen, Hunting Hounds and Empire Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Infantry units with a pistol, Crossbowmen, Huntsmen, Archers, Handgunners, Rijders, Pistoliers and Outriders (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Sons of Manann, Knights of the Blazing Sun, Knights Mariner, Knights of the Cleansing Flame, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh, Landship and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Mortar, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, Helstorm Rocket Battery, War Wagon, Luminark of Hysh and Steam Tank units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Local Guides
skillTree.description: Always use the local guides. They know more about this land than you ever will.

skillTree.name: Way-Finders
skillTree.description: These scouts excel and will ensure the caravan stays on a safe route.

skillTree.name: Hidden Stores
skillTree.description: The caravan holds a concealed space where grains and fruit are kept to keep the retinues refreshed.

effects.description:
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Armies replenish in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -75% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Better Scales
skillTree.description: These favourable weighting scales will ensure true value.

skillTree.name: Cargo Capacity
skillTree.description: "There's more room in the back."

backgroundSkills.name: Former Artillery Officer
backgroundSkills.description: This Merchant Lord has served, or better said - has connections that served, as artillery officers in the State Army. That has it's perks.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army has additional Artillery units

Ammunition: +10% for Mortar, Culverins, Ship's Cannon, Great Cannon, Helblaster Volley Gun, and Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Norscan Heritage
backgroundSkills.description: It is not uncommon that Norscan tribes cross over with the Empiric provincies situated North of the Empire. Like the Bjornling tribe, who openly trade and migrate with Marienburg.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army has additional Militia units

backgroundSkills.name: Griffon Whisperer
backgroundSkills.description: The State Navy is protected by flocks of Huge Seagull like Griffon Riders, they are expensive yet loyal.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Griffon Riders units

backgroundSkills.name: Ogre Ally
backgroundSkills.description: This Merchant Lord knows keeping Ogres in check is not as hard as people say: Keep them fed and pay them well.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Ogre Mercenary units

backgroundSkills.name: Eastern Idealist
backgroundSkills.description: This Merchant Lord has traded not just along the Gilded Route, but the Ivory Road all the same.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Cathayan units

Armour-piercing missile damage: +15% for Crane Gunners units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master Cavalry Commander
backgroundSkills.description: Not all horses appreciate long trips a board merchant vessels, but the ones that don't mind are usually the most hardened horses out there.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army has additional Cavalry units

backgroundSkills.name: Master Gunner
backgroundSkills.description: This Merchant Lord has had much experience trading within the City of Nuln, where the finest gunpowder is tradeable.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army has additional Gunner units

backgroundSkills.name: Aristocratic
backgroundSkills.description: Mixed heritage with old Westerlandic Nobility, the aristocrats of Marienburg relish at the thought of times of old.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Burgher units

backgroundSkills.name: Manann Zealot
backgroundSkills.description: Manann decides if we make it to our destination or not, nothing else. Manann is the wind, the tide and the waves. Pray he is lenient.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Worshippers of Manann

Melee attack: +6 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Solkan Zealot
backgroundSkills.description: Along the various trade stops made by the convoy's one finds the most despicable abominations, ripe for Solkan's vengeance.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Patrons of Solkan

backgroundSkills.name: Elf Ally
backgroundSkills.description: The Elves of Elfsgemeente have a fair deal of influence on Marienburger trade, although without a seat at the directorate's table.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes High Elf units

backgroundSkills.name: Dwarf Ally
backgroundSkills.description: House Fooger is one of the oldest and most influentual Merchant Families of the Wasteland, their convoys often protected by Dwarf brethren.

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Dwarf units

Melee defence: +5 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Erengrad Trader
backgroundSkills.description: When business is slow in Erengrad, many traders migrate to Marienburg in search of better opportunities

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Kislevite units

backgroundSkills.name: Bretonnian Noble
backgroundSkills.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Brettonian units

effects.description: This Lord's caravan army includes Brettonian units

Charge bonus: +20% for Knight units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Southern Realm Ally
backgroundSkills.description:
This Lord's caravan army includes units from Southern Realms
	Note: Requires TEB to be enabled.

effects.description:
This Lord's caravan army includes units from Southern Realms
	Note: Requires TEB to be enabled.

Units gain +1% weapon and missile strength per rank achieved
	(Lord's army)
